title: ISAW Library Blog
description: News, information, and features from the Library of the Institute for the Study of the Ancient World at New York University.

title: Antiquarian volumes in the ISAW Library collection
description: The ISAW Libraryâ€™s collection has been built largely through the acquisition of the private libraries of important scholars of ancient history, art, and archaeology. Several of these collections included antiquarian volumes, which frequently require special care and attention.
